title: Practical exams on Drama, Theatra subjects from April 29 to May 5
body_lines: The Examinations Department today announced that they would conduct the practical examinations for the dancing and music subjects of G.C.E. Advanced Level 2021 (2022) from April 29 to May 5.

Accordingly, the practical examinations for Drama and Theatra subjects (No. 57,58) in Sinhala and Tamil languages will be held for 6,718 applicants at 67 practical examination centres. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
